Gayatri Mantra (Full).sanskrit:
ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः।
तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं।
भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि।
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्॥
Gayatri Mantra (Full).transliteration:
Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Svaḥ,
Tat Savitur Vareṇyaṁ,
Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi,
Dhiyo Yo Naḥ Pracodayāt.
Gayatri Mantra (Full).english: We meditate upon the divine light of the three realms—earth, atmosphere, and heavens. May that divine light illuminate our intellects and inspire us towards the path of truth and righteousness.

Saraswati Vandana (Full).sanskrit:
या कुन्देन्दुतुषारहारधवला या शुभ्रवस्त्रावृता।
या वीणावरदण्डमण्डितकरा या श्वेतपद्मासना॥
या ब्रह्माच्युतशंकरप्रभृतिभिर्देवैः सदा पूजिता।
सा मां पातु सरस्वती भगवती नि:शेषजाड्यापहा॥
Saraswati Vandana (Full).transliteration:
Yā Kundendu Tuṣhārāhāra Dhavalā Yā Śubhra Vastrāvr̥tā,
Yā Vīṇā Varadaṇḍa Maṇḍita Karā Yā Śveta Padmāsanā,
Yā Brahmācyuta Śaṁkara Prabhṛtibhir Devaiḥ Sadā Pūjitā,
Sā Māṁ Pātu Sarasvatī Bhagavatī Niḥśeṣa Jāḍyāpahā.
Saraswati Vandana (Full).english: Salutations to Goddess Saraswati, who is as fair as the jasmine flower and moonlight, who wears white garments, whose hands are adorned with the veena, who is worshipped by Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, and other deities. May she remove my ignorance and bless me with wisdom.

Respect Parents Shloka (Full).sanskrit:
मातृ देवो भव। पितृ देवो भव।
आचार्य देवो भव। अतिथि देवो भव॥
Respect Parents Shloka (Full).transliteration:
Mātṛ Devo Bhava, Pitṛ Devo Bhava,
Ācārya Devo Bhava, Atithi Devo Bhava.
Respect Parents Shloka (Full).english: Regard your mother as divine, regard your father as divine, regard your teacher as divine, regard your guest as divine.

Guru Stotra (Full).sanskrit:
गुरुर्ब्रह्मा गुरुर्विष्णुः गुरुर्देवो महेश्वरः।
गुरुः साक्षात् परं ब्रह्म तस्मै श्रीगुरवे नमः॥
अखण्डमण्डलाकारं व्याप्तं येन चराचरम्।
तत्पदं दर्शितं येन तस्मै श्रीगुरवे नमः॥
Guru Stotra (Full).transliteration:
Gurur Brahmā Gurur Viṣhṇuḥ Gurur Devo Maheśvaraḥ,
Guruḥ Sākṣāt Paraṁ Brahma Tasmai Śrī Gurave Namah.
Akhaṇḍa Maṇḍalākāraṁ Vyāptaṁ Yena Carācaram,
Tat Padaṁ Darśitaṁ Yena Tasmai Śrī Gurave Namah.
Guru Stotra (Full).english: The Guru is Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva — the Supreme Being. Salutations to that revered Guru. The Guru who revealed the infinite truth that pervades the whole universe, to that Guru I bow.
